title: Hostile Takeover: Volume 5 of the Don't Close Your Eyes Series
description: She was hurt. I was exhausted with the distance between us.Yeah, Jase dropped what I was too eager to steal for my own. Imagine my surprise when Kinsley came willingly.***A simple visit to his house – sure.I could enter the belly of the beast without being consumed by the chemistry we’ve battled … right?Wrong.I thought he’d use coercion, cunning, calculation. Turns out, the one lying in wait, prepared to pounce, was me.Too bad I never asked myself what happens if we pass the point of no return, because we did, and life will never be the same.
author: Lynessa Layne
